mapper.sql: ID, MER_CODE, MER_KEY_TYPE, MER_MD5_PAYPWD, MER_MD5_BACKPAYPWD, INNER_PAYPWD, INNER_BACKPAYPWD, MER_RSA_PRI, MER_RSA_PUB, MER_DSA_PRI, MER_DSA_PUB, ACTIVATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert:
select MER_KEY_TYPE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO MER_KEY_TYPE (ID,CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_USER,MER_CODE,MER_KEY_TYPE, MER_MD5_PAYPWD,MER_MD5_BACKPAYPWD,MER_RSA_PRI,MER_RSA_PUB,MER_DSA_PRI, MER_DSA_PUB,INNER_PAYPWD,INNER_BACKPAYPWD,ACTIVATE) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merKeyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merMd5Paypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merMd5Backpaypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merRsaPri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merRsaPub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merDsaPri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merDsaPub,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerPaypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerBackpaypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0')
